description: The Suntoucher is Tread and Butter's new low arch, low volume insole. Using the same construction and materials as their flagship Cascadia insole, the Suntoucher is 30 percent lower volume in the heel and arch, while maintaining the same amount of cushioning and support. If you have a low arch, or a sensitive arch, or proverbial flat feet, the Suntoucher is the one.
name: Tread & Butter Suntoucher - Low Arch - Mens

specs.key: The Suntoucher is their low arch cork insole, made to keep your arch elevated and help mitigate foot pain caused by maladies like plantar fasciitis. And this is key
specs.value: our insoles come in full size runs. No trimming. No fuss. If you wear a half size shoe, they generally recommend you round up to the nearest whole size.
